Elon Musk - As the CEO of SpaceX and Tesla, Elon Musk has revolutionized the world of technology and space exploration. Swapping places with him would allow me to gain valuable insights into the cutting-edge innovations and groundbreaking projects he's working on. I'd love to experience the thrill of being at the forefront of technological advancements and contribute to shaping the future of humanity's space exploration.

Greta Thunberg - As a climate activist, Greta Thunberg has been a beacon of hope for millions of young people around the world. By swapping places with her, I would gain a deeper understanding of the urgent need for climate action and the ways in which individuals can make a difference. I'd love to experience the passion and determination that drives her to fight for a sustainable future.

David Attenborough - As a renowned naturalist and broadcaster, David Attenborough has spent his career educating the world about the wonders of the natural world. Swapping places with him would allow me to gain a deeper appreciation for the beauty and complexity of the planet's ecosystems. I'd love to experience the joy of discovering new species and habitats, and learn from his vast knowledge of the natural world.

Lin-Manuel Miranda - As a creator of hit Broadway shows like Hamilton and In the Heights, Lin-Manuel Miranda has made a lasting impact on the world of theater and music. Swapping places with him would allow me to gain insight into the creative process behind his works, and learn from his ability to blend different art forms to tell compelling stories. I'd love to experience the thrill of creating something new and innovative, and see the impact it can have on audiences around the world.

Malala Yousafzai - As a Nobel Peace Prize laureate and education activist, Malala Yousafzai has fought tirelessly for the rights of girls and women around the world. Swapping places with her would allow me to gain a deeper understanding of the challenges facing marginalized communities, and learn from her unwavering commitment to fighting for social justice. I'd love to experience the courage and resilience that has inspired millions of people to stand up
